body: Kii Chan is stupid af.

So the problem here is the kii-guy believing on an assumption and not doing the initiative and just became a shipper for his osananajimi and the guy but can't bear to get cucked so he distanced himself. Now that the girl said it(shed scene), he can't do anything anymore because he has high moral values and can't bear to have the other guy suffer. Fuck these japanese values, that's why there's so much cuck titles here
It will be better if kii chan chan is acting more like a human not unrealistic like this.
Who hurt you, author?
grounded in reality  for teenage love without any big contingencies.Mild ntr done right for once
Ha! blame Kii-chan for being a wimp. Sawajima deserves the girl. A ntr everyone would love as we rarely get a ntr with a good guy.
It's not the continuation to the part one? how sad
No better illustration for the phrase "you snooze you lose!"
Por communication kills
This isn't NTR its just a relation that never became due to fear of him, it's a really good story this could be a Shoujo manga with sexual content very good written story.

The dude suffered the consequences of being such a wuss. He got a little scared since he saw chemistry between the girl and the flute playing boy but it's only cause he made her wait so long and even then he still had the best chance but he blew it since he keeps being aloof despite that though at the end his facade caves so all his stone-cold reactions to her asking about them and what they are to each other were just pussy attempts at keeping the status quo. At least he didn't cry at the end but he looked pathetic finally trying to reach out to her when she was finally getting laid with another guy
bish got cucked the fuck out mane
Its not NTR, Actually! Its a typical drama.
@metroid -  Have you ever thought that....? I don’t have the same username... Imagine having the same password user ID in all of the social media/manga/anime/hentai sites…
@Iexpectedbetter As a real life cuck who complains under every ntr hentai on this site I am sure you know it the best lol

But that's right, it's not just about treason, actually a lot of people believe that NTR is just treason but it is not. Overall it is about the author giving you bad feelings, as betrayal is one of the worst feelings and is what else there is in doujin, think that this is the base of NTR.(sorry for bad english, not my first language)
@Ravenleaf You obviously dont know the meaning of Netorare. Its a real word not some made up word about feels

I think you all tend to forget, NTR is just a story intended to invoke great feelings in the reader, its not necessiarly a girl/guy getting stolen, it just has a mass of feels that carry on to the reader.
@Troncol Stop copy pasting comments from e hentai
Not enough sex too much boring talk this fails as a hentai manga

McDonalds trademarked the phrase "100% Beef" and used it to describe their burger's meat patties, despite them having less than 50% actual beef content for years. What the intention and what the actual outcome is, are not always going to be identical. And like mentioned earlier, this is effectively just a more extreme version of what the movie 5cm Per Second was about.

This doesn't even feel like a NTR...lol the guy was a beta male it's as simple as that...I'd be surprised if people were to blame the girl at all for choosing the other dude...lol that dude was such b*tch that it was comical.

The "N" in the title stands for netorare. I'm gonna trust the nip author's judgement on his own work this time. Well, if this qualifies as NTR, it's one of the better ones. Doesn't really rely on bullshit just to move things along, the characters feel a bit more believable, there isn't a stock NTR protagonist, villain, or dumb girl. Hell, even the fact that there's no 180 flip featuring rape -> love is really impressive. Not too shabby, I must say.
Some weak-ass ntr to slap the ntr tag on it. Must think 5cm Per Second is ntr or something.

this was pretty sad. I feel kinda bad for them but at the same time I think the reality and truth in this is really great. You can't win the girl you love if you are willing to just give her up, you can't just wait forever. I think a lot of people have experienced this at least to some degree in their life, its hard watching the one you love love someone else, its even harder to win that love. In this case I think the guy who didn't give up is truly the one that deserved to wind up with her, and frankly, thats just how it is.
